content:
hl7-fhircast-bot opened Issue #144

## May 2019 Ballot Comment: Add the traditional table describing the message fields for Request Context Change.

Submitted by Ricardo Quintano Neira
Chapter/section: Request Context Change
Url: https://fhircast.hl7.org/specification/May2019Ballot/index.html
Type: NEG :exclamation: Clarification

Summary: Add the traditional table describing the message fields for Request Context Change.

Comment: I suggest adding the the traditional table describing the message fields for Request Context Change.

See table example in Event Notification Request Details section.

_This issue was imported by @hl7-fhircast-bot from the consolidated FHIRcast May 2019 ballot spreadsheet._

wmaethner commented on Issue #144:

## :landline: II Working Group Vote (6-18-2019)
Block vote

@isaacvetter moved the following disposition, seconded by Ricardo Quintano Neira

Disposition: Persuasive
Disposition Comment: Will fix as described in the issue comments or by the commenter

:+1: For: 10
:expressionless: Abstain: 2
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:
